info.description: This is the restification as a service of the apimanager-swagger-promote tool available on the Axway GITHUB https://github.com/Axway-API-Management-Plus/apimanager-swagger-promote. You can find out more about Swagger at https://github.com/Axway-API-Management-Plus/apimanager-swagger-promote/swagger-promote-restapi/swagger/swagger-promote-restapi
info.title: Swagger Promote API

parameters.name: configFile
parameters.description: Configuration file which described environment properties where the API should be imported

parameters.name: apiDefinition
parameters.description: API definition file (swagger V2.0) in JSON format  which should be imported

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: if true the desired API state take over the existing one in case of breaking state. If no, no changes made

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: login of API manager admin account
password of API manager admin account
parameters.name: password
